movies.name: Мегалодон
movies.description: Мегалодон (кино 2023) Хоррор о неуловимом монстре в духе «Челюстей»

movies.name: The Creator
movies.description: Insoniyat va sun’iy intellekt o‘rtasidagi urush kelajagini belgilaydi.

movies.name: Killers of the Flower Moon
movies.description: 1920-yillardagi Osage qotilliklari haqidagi haqiqiy voqea.

movies.name: Tenet
movies.description: Vaqtni orqaga qaytarish orqali dunyoni saqlab qolish missiyasi.

movies.name: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
movies.description: Kapitol o‘yinlarining kelib chiqishi va yosh Snowning hikoyasi.

movies.name: Barbie
movies.description: Barbi real dunyoga kirib, o‘z mohiyatini kashf etadi.

movies.name: Wonka
movies.description: Yosh Uilli Vonka shokolad imperiyasining boshlanishini yaratadi.

movies.name: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
movies.description: Indiana Jons vaqtni o‘zgartiruvchi artefaktni izlab sarguzashtga chiqadi.

movies.name: Blue Beetle
movies.description: Jaime Reyes tasodifan kosmik texnologiyali superqahramonga aylanadi.

movies.name: The Little Mermaid
movies.description: Ariel inson dunyosini orzu qilib, muhabbatni tanlaydi.

movies.name: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
movies.description: Mario va Luiyi boshqa olamni qutqarish uchun sarguzashtga chiqadi.

movies.name: The Whale
movies.description: Og‘ir holatdagi o‘qituvchi o‘z qizini kechirishni istaydi.
Uzoq sayyorada halokatdan so‘ng tirik qolgan ikki inson dinozavrlar bilan kurashadi.

movies.name: The Nun II
movies.description: Valak ruhoniyni qayta dahshatga soladi.

movies.name: Elemental
movies.description: Olov va suv unsurlari o‘rtasidagi kutilmagan do‘stlik haqida.

movies.name: Gran Turismo
movies.description: O‘yinchi haqiqiy poyga haydovchisiga aylanish yo‘lida sarguzashtga kirishadi.

movies.name: Jumong 1-qism
movies.description: Jumong saltanatining boshlanishi haqida birinchi qism.

movies.name: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Pandora sayyorasiga qaytgan Jeyk Salli va uning oilasi yangi xavflarga duch keladi.

movies.name: Extraction 2
movies.description: Tyler Rake yangi xavfli missiyada yana hayot va o‘lim o‘rtasida kurashadi.

movies.name: Oppenheimer
movies.description: Atom bombasining yaratilishi va uning oqibatlari haqida dramatik hikoya.

movies.name: Inception
movies.description: Tushlar ichida yashirin haqiqatlar va ongni boshqarish sirlari haqida.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: Insoniyatning omon qolishi uchun yulduzlar orasidagi sarguzasht.

movies.name: John Wick 4
movies.description: Jon Uik o‘z erkinligi uchun yakuniy jangga kirishadi.

movies.name: Fast X
movies.description: Dominik Toretto va jamoasi yangi dushman bilan to‘qnashadi.

movies.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Olamlar to‘qnashuvida uchta o‘rgimchak odam birlashadi.

movies.name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
movies.description: Doktor Strenj multiverse orqali xavfli sayohatga chiqadi.

movies.name: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.description: Vaqt va yo‘qotishlar fonida yangi qahramonlar paydo bo‘ladi.

movies.name: The Batman
movies.description: Batman yangi jinoyatlar ortidagi sirni fosh qiladi.

movies.name: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.description: Neo yana Matritsaga qaytadi, lekin bu safar haqiqat boshqacha.

movies.name: Dune: Part One
movies.description: Arrakis sayyorasidagi kuch va taqdir uchun jang.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
movies.description: Galaktika qahramonlari do‘stlik va sadoqatni sinovdan o‘tkazadi.

movies.name: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning
movies.description: Eton Xant yangi xavfli topshiriqni bajaradi.

movies.name: The Flash
movies.description: Barry Allen vaqtni o‘zgartirishga urinadi — va bu kutilmagan oqibatlarga olib keladi.

movies.name: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
movies.description: Avtobotlar va yangi hayvon shaklidagi robotlar Yer uchun jang qiladi.

movies.name: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
movies.description: Akvamen o‘z qirolligini himoya qilish uchun yana jangga kirishadi.

movies.name: The Marvels
movies.description: Kapitan Marvel, Monika va Kamala o‘z kuchlarini birlashtiradi.
